trainings.technique: Reverse De la riva guard and the unstoppable sweep
trainings.preTrainingGoals: Focus on the details and create distance when on defense
trainings.generalNotes: Remember to dip knees toward the opponent and then lift up. Remember to cross feet at the ankles.

trainings.preTrainingGoals: Do whatever it takes not to get pinned
trainings.postTrainingGoals: Relax a little when getting pinned
trainings.generalNotes: After opening closed guard, put left foot on opponent's right hip to lift up and throw the leg above the opponent's head.
